means: 横卧的，匍匐的，爬在地上的

sentence.Network_en: North American decumbent evergreen heathlike plant with yellow flowers.
sentence.Network_cn: 北美的一种匍匐的石南状常绿植物,开黄花.

sentence.Network_en: African shrub having decumbent stems and slender yellow honey - scented flowers either solitary or in pairs.
sentence.Network_cn: 非洲灌木,有横卧的茎和苗条的黄色的有蜂蜜香的叶子,或单独或成双生长.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: from Latin decumbent- 'lying down', from the verb decumbere, based on de- 'down' + a verb related to cubare 'to lie'

means.word_mean: 1. lying down; in a position of comfort or rest
